MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 04-NOV-2020 16:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: This is a message for customers in the TD11 postcode area of Duns. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.00pm to safely carry out repairs to an overhead line network fault near to Fellcleugh and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:29pm on Wednesday, 04 November 2020.
